J

join(String, ViewInterface, boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameController
Method used to join the game managed by this controller if the player joining is no more part of the game, the player is moved to the login form else it logs the join event on the server, saves the game state, updates the model, updates the view of the joining player with the data corresponding with the current phase of the game, and notifies the other players of the join event If the player joining is the only player in the game, it starts the last player in game timer Logs the event on the server
JOIN_GAME - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.inputs.CommandPrompt
The command to join an existing game
JOIN_LOBBY - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.StateGUI

JOIN_LOBBY - Enum constant in enum class it.polimi.ingsw.view.ViewState
 
JOIN_LOBBY_LIST - Static variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.LogsOnClient
 
joinLobby() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.Components.PreGame.LobbyListJoinGUI
Joins the selected lobby.
joinLobby(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.RMI.VirtualRMI.VirtualControllerRMI
Call the joinLobby method of the controller on the server.
joinLobby(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.Socket.VirtualSocket.VirtualControllerSocket
Sends a joinLobby message to the server
joinLobby(String) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Controller
The method forwards the call to the lobbyGameListController to join a lobby
joinLobby(String) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces.ControllerInterface
This method is used to join an existent lobby adding the player to the lobby and updating its view If the lobby becomes full after the player joins, the game starts If the lobby doesn't exist, the player is notified
joinLobby(String, String, GameControllerReceiver) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces.LobbyGameListsController
This method is used to join a lobby in the lobby list If the lobby name is not in the lobby list, the player is prompted to choose another one If the player is already in a lobby or a game, the player is considered malevolent If the lobby is full before joining, the player is prompted to choose another one If the lobby is full after joining, the game starts
joinLobby(String, String, GameControllerReceiver) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.LobbyGameListsController
Method that handles the joining of a lobby.
JoinLobbyMsg - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.Socket.ClientMsg
Message that contains the name of the lobby that the player wants to join and calls the controller for joining a lobby
JoinLobbyMsg(String) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.connectionLayer.Socket.ClientMsg.JoinLobbyMsg
Constructor of the class
